title: [K-12] Mobile App Design Course for Self-Care After Breast Cancer Surgery

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology comprehension and mobile app usage experience
context.additional_context: Mobile app design process education based on the ADDIE model for novice medical professionals

learning_goals: A patient management app planning document for post-mastectomy care can be created by applying the five ADDIE model phases (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation)
At least three functional app design requirements can be derived by analyzing self-care needs of post-mastectomy patients
Mobile app prototypes can be evaluated at least once, and improvement strategies can be suggested

resources: Standard Protocol for Breast Cancer Patient Management

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
